abstrac: WordPress Development, Security, Web Development, App Development, Algorithm Development, Design, Business Strategy, Customer Support, and automated Marketing Expert.
bio:
Thanks for checking out my profile. 

I offer WordPress, PHP, ASP.NET, C#, C++, HTML, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, Python, Ruby on Rails, and JAVA development services ; I can assist with web,  game, mobile, windows software, and firmware development. 

I also offer Security services (Malware removal, security hardening, advance level scanning, and maintenance) 

If you're looking for a reliable developer that delivers work that stands the test of time - it's me. I like to think of myself as an all-round ringer as I enjoy seeing projects to completion. 

I specialize in a diverse range of expertise that is hyper-focused on saving you time, producing high quality code, and achieving success. 

I take your projects and goals seriously and I endeavor to show this in my work irrespective of budget or project size. 

I have 14 years of industry experience and I never stop learning. Each day is an opportunity to get better at my craft and my attitude equates to better communication on every project. 

I can also assist with business strategy, development and design (both web and mobile app), advanced algorithm development, customer support, and automated Marketing initiatives. I love working on automation so if streamlining your business processes through code is your aim... I'm an excellent pick. 

I look forward to working with you.

Work hours: 9am to 7pm CST 
Availability: short notice, I check on emails and comms regularly. 
Payments: 100% Safepay or Retainers.

abstrac: Graphic design | Email Coding and Testing
bio:
As Graphic Designer I have 18, and as freelancer 5 years of international experience, and had clients from different sides of Globe.

Summary of skills: 

• Over 18 years’ experience as graphic designer and 5 as freelancer 
• Experience in print design and desktop publishing
• Experience in email newsletters and web site design
• Ability to work both within a team and on my own initiative
• Ability to work quickly and efficiently under pressure and to tight deadlines
• Strong visualisation and good graphic design skills and a knowledge of printing and prepress processes
• Attention to detail
• Excellent communication skills both verbally and written
• Experience working on advertising material such as newspapers, leaflets, posters, brochures, magazines, email newsletters, landing pages, banners, etc.
• Proficiency in Adobe tools including, InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Dreamweaver, Acrobat, CorelDraw, MS Office, PC and Apple Mac.

I am well versed in different areas of graphic design (icons, infographics, logos, brochures, layouts, templates, presentations, adverts, covers and books), and online/digital solutions (interactive PDF, FLIPHTML5, FB covers, banners, HTML, CSS, email newsletters, CRM, websites and mobile applications. 

So if you are looking for someone who can finish your project fast, on time, with great communications skills, please be free to contact me.

I have taken on diverse challenges and proven my ability to deliver positive results as much as a capability to fast adapt to any situation, learned how to be stress resilient, and dead line aware.

From that stand I do expect same from client - mostly fast response and edits, since this way our project will have higher quality. 

My time is valuable, as much as yours. 

I'm available every day, no matter of your time zone, and happy if we can communicate during work.

abstrac: A Guru for All Your Technical, Scientific, and Financial Needs!
bio:
I'm an automation and information technology electrical engineer with over 30 years of experience in electronics and computers. 
At the age of 12, electronics was my first passion and I built a TV tennis game beside many other electronic devices.
Many years later, after I got my master's degree, I started working as a teacher at the University of Oradea, Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Information Technology, Department of Computer Science where I’ve taught thousands of students in both hardware and software fields, for over 15 years. 
I owned it for 5 years Java professorship and my last position was as an assistant professor.

I have a vast experience in many fields including:
- design/prototyping/manufacturing of various electrical/electronic devices
- software development/firmware development
- web design/web programming
- CAD design / CAM programming
- 3D modeling / 3D rendering / 3D animation
- rapid prototyping using different technologies
- video editing/photo editing/audio editing

I'm also a pioneer in freelancing, I started working as a freelancer in 2001 through other freelancing platforms and I have successfully completed hundreds of projects in various categories with very close to 5-star average satisfaction reviews from my customers.

bio:
iQuinceSoft is an India based ISO 9001: 2015 certified organization with 11+ years of experience in web design and mobile app development. We have been able to secure a standard and well–positioned office facility in a central business district in Mathura, the holy city in Uttar Pradesh. We are a software development company that is set to compete in the highly competitive web design, mobile app, and e-commerce development services industry not only in the Indian market but also in the global market. 

iQuinceSoft offers all aspects of web design services and mobile app development services such as Web Design, Graphic, and Commercial art services, Corporate Identification design services (logos), iPhone app development, Android app development, and Internet marketing services. Our business goal is to become one of the leading software development companies all over the world. 

At IQuinceSoft, our client’s best interest will always come first, and everything we do will be guided by our values and professional ethics. We will ensure that we hold ourselves accountable to the highest standards by meeting our client’s needs precisely and completely. We will cultivate a working environment that provides a human, sustainable approach to earning a living, and living in our world, for our partners, employees and for our clients.

bio:
Are you in the market for software development? Do you need full-scope services entailing back-end AND front-end development tasks? Then you’ve come to the right place.

My name’s Giorgi, and I’m a full stack developer and software development expert with a B.Sc. in software engineering and more than 10 years experience in many different areas of the industry. I specialize in a number of different fields, including:
• Back-end to Front-end development
◦ PHP
◦ Python frameworks
◦ Javascript frameworks
• Blockchain Development
• Mobile App Development
• Windows/Linux/Mac app development
• Deep Learning/AI/Image Processing
My tools and software list is extensive, so if there’s anything in particular that you need to be used, just mention it and I’ll likely be able to integrate it into the work plans.

I am always available on Freelancer, offering 24/7 customer support and troubleshooting, and quick response on new projects or proposals. I guarantee accurate timelines, easy communication, and top-notch products that will meet all your software needs.

So what are you waiting for? Fire me off a message or hit the “Hire Me Now” button and let’s get started!

abstrac: Your time is valuable. Let me create the content you need so you can focus on other things that also matter to you.
bio:
I'm Dr Sophie and I'm a native English speaker. I earned my Masters and PhD degree in English and Literature from Harvard University, Massachusetts, USA. Yes from USA, as it was my dream to go to Harvard University to excel in my mother tongue. Despite being from a poor family, I managed to study throughout at Harvard University on a scholarship that I received as a result of my remarkable performance at school.

I believe I'm highly experienced writer and editor, having worked as an in-house editor and freelancer for more than 10 years. I also hold a diploma in editing and proofreading along with a PhD-level qualification.

Since then, I'm passionate about writing and contributing to projects that need high-quality content. I'm a freelance writer, author, editor and content manager with an impeccable command of the English language. I have been offering freelance writing, editing and proofreading services to businesses and clients, writing in a plethora of niches including;

-Fiction and Nonfiction Books
- Sports blogs and articles
-Creative Stories.
-Politics
-Technology and Cryptocurrencies
-Business and Finance
-Health and Wellness
-Sales and Marketing
-News Articles
-Academic and Research Articles
-Entertainment and Lifestyle Articles
-Web Content (About Us, FAQs, etc.)

In addition, I have more than 5 years of working experiences in SMM and SEO. I’m an expert Social Media Marketer with knowledge of full internet marketing techniques. I know that I would be an asset to your team and would very much appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my education, experience and creativity could contribute to your project

Quality service, prompt turnaround arrangements and Client's satisfaction are my top priorities.

Contact me now, let's discuss how to achieve your goals.

I am a very flexible person to work with. That is the reason why I always work around the needs of my client. However, at the same time I also have my family so I do not work on Saturdays and Sundays as that is my family time, I hope you will understand that:).
